Enterprise-Connect March 2013
Join PGi at Enterprise Connect as we study groundbreaking new communication and collaboration trends for enterprises.
Not registered for Enterprise Connect yet? Get a free expo pass ($100 after March 18) here or if you would like to attend the full conference, use our special promo code, ECOLOVE, for $200 off Entire Event or Tuesday-Thursday Conference Passes.
Come visit us in Booth 118 where we will be hosting iMeet and GlobalMeet demos and offering daily raffles! You can also see us in Plantronics Booth 419 to find out about our newest iMeet integration. Email me at {!User.Email} or call {!User.Phone} if you plan to stop by and I'll be sure to save you a demo spot and a special gift.
Looking forward to seeing you at Enterprise Connect!
